name: Music in colors
description:
The most important question anyone can ask - is the universe is a friendly sphere?
The answer to this question determines what we do with our lives. If the universe is a friendly sphere, then we will spend our lives building bridges. Otherwise, people will spend all their time building walls. It's up to us to decide!
Quote by Albert Einstein

Artwork created by Maksym Denysenko in 2020
 200x50cm Spray paint on canvas 4692x1129 pix
